content: tiny crochet pumpkin garland pattern written by michelle meier of the crafty maritimer tiny crochet pumpkin garland materials bulky yarn in orange and brown or any pumpkin/stem color 6 5 mm crochet hook or size needed for desired gauge yarn needle / darning needle yarn or twine for garland strand abbreviations st - stitch double_crochet- double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet mc magic_ring stay in touch i d love to see your finished socks or hear how your project went feel free to reach out or share online website thecraftymaritimer ca instagram @thecraftymaritimer facebook the crafty maritimer email thecraftymaritimer@gmail com ravelry michellemeier 1 pattern instructions make as many pumpkins as desired for your garland pumpkin body 1 begin with a magic_ring mc 2 into the mc work 1 single_crochet 8 double_crochet 1 single_crochet 3 pull the circle closed tightly and fasten_off weave in ends if needed this creates a small rounded pumpkin shape pumpkin stem 1 using a yarn needle and a contrasting yarn green brown or color of your choice insert the yarn through the center of the pumpkin from front to back 2 tie a small knot or simple stitch to mimic a stem secure and trim excess yarn as needed garland assembly 1 cut a length of yarn or twine for the garland base length depends on desired spacing and number of pumpkins 2 space pumpkins approximately 2 5 inches 6 5 cm apart 3 attach each pumpkin by tying the yarn used for the stem around the garland strand or by sewing them directly to the strand with a yarn needle notes pumpkins can be made in a variety of colors for a fun and whimsical look try adding a touch of cinnamon or essential oil to the yarn for a fall-scented garland finishing weave in all yarn ends securely block lightly if needed to shape 1
